version_description:
Dans cette version, nous avons optimisé la fonction Recherche tout en peaufinant les performances de l'appli.

Voici les erreurs résolues :

* Une erreur avec la fonctionnalité ID de l’appelant a été corrigée. Vous saurez quand un contact vous a appelé.
* Les événements où un utilisateur est un participant sont désormais répertoriés dans le module Accueil de l’utilisateur respectif.
* L’absence d’affichage des enregistrements concernant certaines vues personnalisées a été rectifiée.
* Certains crashs de l’appli... et bien d’autres


Vous avez basculé sur iOS10 ? Découvrez comment optimiser votre expérience de ventes avec iOS10 et Zoho CRM grâce à des outils géniaux :

* ID de l’appelant
* Suggestions proactives
* Conversion audio en texte
* Widget du jour
* 3D Touch
* Recherche d’actualités

Lien : https://www.zoho.com/crm/ios10.html

Dans cette version, nous avons optimisé la fonction Recherche tout en peaufinant les performances de l'appli.

Voici les erreurs résolues :

* Une erreur avec la fonctionnalité ID de l’appelant a été corrigée. Vous saurez quand un contact vous a appelé.
* Les événements où un utilisateur est un participant sont désormais répertoriés dans le module Accueil de l’utilisateur respectif.
* L’absence d’affichage des enregistrements concernant certaines vues personnalisées a été rectifiée.
* Certains crashs de l’appli... et bien d’autres

Dans cette version, nous avons optimisé la fonction Recherche tout en peaufinant les performances de l'appli.

Voici les erreurs résolues :

* Une erreur avec la fonctionnalité ID de l’appelant a été corrigée. Vous saurez quand un contact vous a appelé.
* Les événements où un utilisateur est un participant sont désormais répertoriés dans le module Accueil de l’utilisateur respectif.
* L’absence d’affichage des enregistrements concernant certaines vues personnalisées a été rectifiée.
* Certains crashs de l’appli... et bien d’autres

3.2.5

Passcode Lock with Touch ID: We've now introduced the Passcode lock feature for an extra layer of security.
Task Reminders: Set reminders for tasks and stay on top of them via notifications.
We've squashed a few bugs in this update as well.

3.2.2

Upgraded to iOS10? Read through on how you can make your sales experience that much better with iOS10 and Zoho CRM with these cool features:

* Caller ID
* Proactive suggestions
* Voice to text Conversion
* Today Widget
* 3D touch
* Spotlight search

Link: https://www.zoho.com/crm/ios10.html

The Zoho CRM app is all set and iPhone X ready.

iOS11:
• Drag and Drop: Managing and moving around your files, notes and contacts is now a piece of cake with the all new Drag and Drop functionality.
• Attachments: You can now attach files to records from the device's Files app.

We've taken down a few tough bugs in this update as well.

• Attachments: You can now attach files to records from the device's Files app.

We've taken down a few tough bugs in this update as well.

• Drag and Drop: Managing and moving around your files, notes and contacts is now a piece of cake with the all new Drag and Drop functionality.
• Attachments: You can now attach files to records from the device's Files app.

We've taken down a few tough bugs in this update as well.

- We've addressed a scenario wherein the reminder for tasks could not be set at the date that was the same as the due date.
- A scenario wherein the closing date of the deal was set incorrectly to a prior date is now addressed.
- Fixed a bug which caused the Details View of a mail to appear blank.
- We have made some changes under the hood to address crash scenarios and rectify bugs.

Introducing Zia : Zia is a handy AI powered sales assistant which will transform the way you communicate with your CRM.
You can ask Zia to help you carry out the following actions in real quick time:
- Create records
- Add notes
- Convert leads
- Call your customers and
- Change the status of your deals

Introducing Zia : Zia is a handy AI powered sales assistant which will transform the way you communicate with your CRM.
You can ask Zia to help you carry out the following actions in real quick time:
- Create records
- Add notes
- Convert leads
- Call your customers and
- Change the status of your deals

Introducing Zia : Zia is a handy AI powered sales assistant which will transform the way you communicate with your CRM.
You can ask Zia to help you carry out the following actions in real quick time:
- Create records
- Add notes
- Convert leads
- Call your customers and
- Change the status of your deals

- We've brought in support to access the KPI components within the Dashboards module.
- Attach images faster and save space at the same time using Image Compression.

- We've brought in support to access the KPI components within the Dashboards module.
- Attach images faster and save space at the same time using Image Compression.

- We've brought in support to access the KPI components within the Dashboards module.
- Attach images faster and save space at the same time using Image Compression.

Siri meets Zia: Siri Shortcuts are here.

- Siri can help launch Zia, your personal sales assistant to help carry out actions like creating tasks, adding notes, converting leads, calling your customers and changing the status of your deals.
- You can also quickly access your activities for the day, deals for the month and dashboards via Siri, Spotlight search and also get suggestions via notifications.

Bug fixes:

- We've addressed a scenario wherein records were not displayed in the custom view when a user lookup field was set as the criteria.
- An issue 'Request pattern incorrect' which cropped up in the Home screen when the device's timezone was set to GMT has been fixed.
- A scenario where the message 'No cellular network' cropped up when a call was made from the app, even though carrier signal was full has been addressed.
- Fixed a few crash scenarios in this update as well.

- You can also quickly access your activities for the day, deals for the month and dashboards via Siri, Spotlight search and also get suggestions via notifications.

Bug fixes:

- We've addressed a scenario wherein records were not displayed in the custom view when a user lookup field was set as the criteria.
- An issue 'Request pattern incorrect' which cropped up in the Home screen when the device's timezone was set to GMT has been fixed.
- A scenario where the message 'No cellular network' cropped up when a call was made from the app, even though carrier signal was full has been addressed.
- Fixed a few crash scenarios in this update as well.

Siri meets Zia: Siri Shortcuts are here.

- Siri can help launch Zia, your personal sales assistant to help carry out actions like creating tasks, adding notes, converting leads, calling your customers and changing the status of your deals.
- You can also quickly access your activities for the day, deals for the month and dashboards via Siri, Spotlight search and also get suggestions via notifications.

Bug fixes:

- We've addressed a scenario wherein records were not displayed in the custom view when a user lookup field was set as the criteria.
- An issue 'Request pattern incorrect' which cropped up in the Home screen when the device's timezone was set to GMT has been fixed.
- A scenario where the message 'No cellular network' cropped up when a call was made from the app, even though carrier signal was full has been addressed.
- Fixed a few crash scenarios in this update as well.

- We've brought in support for Picklist tracking in the mobile app. You can now view and track the history of changes made to picklist values and not miss out on vital information.

- We've now brought in support for Deep linking and Custom URL's. You can now launch the app directly by tapping URL's from different sources.

We've now brought in support for the Subform feature in this update.
* You can now view all the subforms related to a record.
* Add, edit and delete line items related to a record from the app.

- We've now brought in support for contact role hierarchy. Define your data visibility by assigning reporting managers to contacts for easier and well-defined record accessibility.
- We've enhanced the Search functionality. You can now search for module related information across all Zoho services using Zia Search.

- The enhanced 'Change Owner' functionality is now supported in the app. On changing the record owner, users will get the option to change or retain the owner of related records.
- You can now approve, reject, or delegate approval processes and carry out blueprint transitions from 'My Jobs' module in the app.
- We've also brought in support to access 'link URL' type attachments.

- This release , we've taken your feedback on board to make sure you're getting the most from your app experience. With related emails you can keep track of customer emails within records and stay on top of all interactions. You can also send out contextual emails to your customers right from the app.

iOS 13 is here! Get ready to sell with Zoho CRM, now with the iOS 13 experience. 

Dark mode : Better legibility to reduce the strain on your eyes and get things done for longer periods. 
Document scanner : Scan and digitize your documents and store them within relevant records for easy access. 
Context menus : Carry out relevant quick actions for actionable records across all devices.
On device voice-to-text : Enhanced user privacy by supporting on device transcription for the voice-to-text functionality. 
Conversational shortcuts : Customize your Siri shortcuts to quickly access your most frequently used views.

- In this update we’ve brought in support for the following features :

* Web tabs

* Widgets : Extend the functionality of CRM by integrating external services seamlessly.

* Image Field Support : Add/ Update ‘Record images’ to Leads, Contacts, Accounts, Deals, Products, Vendors, Cases, Solutions and Custom modules by tapping on the record image in the app.

- We've also carried out a few app performance enhancements in this update.
